title: Did Pakistan Airlines' declarations in 1979 present Erliner's shadow at the World Trade Center?
subtitle: There is an announcement by Pakistan Airlines in 1979 that a jet plane remains at the World Trade Centre. Is it a real picture, or a post-9-11 fabrication?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An announcement by Pakistan Airlines in 1979 showed that a jet plane remained at the World Trade Center.
